column1: Welcome to Taco Bell. Would you like to try our Doritos Locos Tacos?
Fourteen-karat gold gets yaaa $14 a gram on the open market, got about... 4 grams here...  It's not really worth my time. I guess I can give you a six-layer burrito for it.
Alright, a seven-layer burrito! But that's as high as I'm going!
Uh people keep showing up and telling us what they did wrong.
